article_text:
Photo: AP

Arguably, the recordkeeping segment of the defined contribution industry has never been more competitive.

New product innovations, platform upgrades, and enhanced data-mining capabilities designed to help plan-specialist advisors drive better saving outcomes are rolling out at a feverish rate.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Nick Thornton
article_metadata.description: New products, platform upgrades, and enhanced data-mining capabilities designed to help plan-specialist advisors are rolling out weekly--showing the defined contribution industry is growing ever more competitive.
